Class Student

java.lang.Object
model.User
model.Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a student user who can apply for internships. Students can submit up to MAX_APPLICATIONS applications, view their applications, accept placement offers, and withdraw applications.
Since:
2025-11-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
NTU SC2002 Group

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String userID, String name, String password, String email, int yearOfStudy, String major)
      Constructs a new Student with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      userID - unique student identifier
      name - student's display name
      password - authentication password
      email - student's email address
      yearOfStudy - current year of study (1-5)
      major - academic major or program

  • Method Details

    • getApplications

      public List<Application> getApplications()
      Gets all applications submitted by this student.
      Returns:
      list of applications

    • findApplicationWithID

      public Application findApplicationWithID(int applicationID)
      Finds an application by its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the ID of the application to find
      Returns:
      the matching application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no application with the given ID exists

    • submitApplication

      public Application submitApplication(Internship internship)
      Submits a new application for an internship. Enforces the maximum application limit (excluding withdrawn applications). Prevents duplicate applications to the same internship. Prevents new applications if student already has an accepted placement.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to apply for
      Returns:
      the newly created application
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if maximum applications reached, already applied, or already has accepted placement

    • acceptApplication

      public void acceptApplication(Application app)
      Accepts a successful application and confirms placement. This withdraws all other applications and updates the internship's filled slots.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to accept (must be SUCCESSFUL status)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if application is not in SUCCESSFUL status

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication(Application app, String reason)
      Withdraws an application with a specified reason.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to withdraw
      reason - the reason for withdrawal

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication(Application app)
      Withdraws an application without specifying a reason.
      Parameters:
      app - the application to withdraw

    • setYearOfStudy

      public void setYearOfStudy(int yearOfStudy)
      Sets the student's year of study.
      Parameters:
      yearOfStudy - the year of study (must be 1-5)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if year is out of range

    • setMajor

      public void setMajor(String major)
      Sets the student's academic major.
      Parameters:
      major - the new major (must not be empty)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if major is empty or null
